name: Day of the Serfs
description:
Day Of The Serfs

🌾 Play as a medieval serf, stealing wheat to fuel a peasant revolution 🌾

Day Of The Serfs would be a simple harvesting game, if you were harvesting your own crops!

Adventure through four open-plan levels, hiding from guards and stealing the king’s precious wheat. You will have to keep your stealth and wits about you if you are going to feed the rebellion.

🏞️ 4 levels and 7 voice-acted characters 🏞️

For our take on the harvest theme, we aimed to build a world that was amusing but also populated. There are incedental and player-triggered voice lines to be heard throughout, telling you more about the state of the kingdom and the people within it. You can carefully follow guards to hear what’s on their mind.

🧩 Many ways to play 🧩

Each level has unique puzzles and patrols, but there is never a set route for you to take. You can sneak your own way through Farmer’s Field, Slunham City and more.

Good luck!

Credits
